Flow.description: Autolaunched flow used in Distributor Orchestration

formulas.description: formula created to tag Owner and created by in chatter post. If both are same - tag owner. else tag both

textTemplates.name: ApprovedRequestorBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear Colleague,

A new sample order has been approved by Distributor Manager.

Request Details

Order Number:{!Order.OrderNumber}
Account:{!Order.Account.Name}
Ship To:{!Order.Ship_To_Account__r.Name}
Requestor:{!Order.Owner:User.FirstName} {!Order.Owner:User.LastName}

Portal Information

End Customer:{!Order.End_Customer__c}
Application:{!Order.Application__c}
Potential Volume:{!Order.Potential_Volume1__c}

Order Items

{!Get_Product_Details.OrderItemTableRows}
Item NameQuantityUnit

View Order in Salesforce


Best regards,

Your CRM Support Team

(This is an automated message from the mySalesforce system.)

textTemplates.name: InApprovalRequestorBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear Colleague,

A new sample order has been submitted for approval.

Request Details

Order Number:{!Order.OrderNumber}
Account:{!Order.Account.Name}
Ship To:{!Order.Ship_To_Account__r.Name}
Requestor:{!Order.Owner:User.FirstName} {!Order.Owner:User.LastName}

Portal Information

End Customer:{!Order.End_Customer__c}
Application:{!Order.Application__c}
Potential Volume:{!Order.Potential_Volume1__c}

Order Items

{!Get_Product_Details.OrderItemTableRows}
Item NameQuantityUnit

View Order in Salesforce


Best regards,

Your CRM Support Team

(This is an automated message from the mySalesforce system.)

textTemplates.description: Post to Chatter whenever the Distributor Approves
textTemplates.name: orderDistributorApprovalMessage
orderInApprovalMessage
textTemplates.text: The Sample Order has been submitted to Distributor Manager.

textTemplates.description: Post to Chatter whenever the TSA Rejects
textTemplates.name: orderRejectMessage
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!Order.Owner:User.FirstName} {!Order.Owner:User.LastName},
The Sample Order {!Order.OrderNumber} has been rejected by the distribution manager with the following comments:
{!Get_Approval_Submission_Detail.Comments}
Please note that the status of the order has been changed to {!Order.Status}, you can makes changes to the order again.
Best regards, Your CRM Support Team

textTemplates.name: RejectedRequestorBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear Colleague,

The sample order has been rejected.

Request Details

Order Number:{!Order.OrderNumber}
Account:{!Order.Account.Name}
Ship To:{!Order.Ship_To_Account__r.Name}
Requestor:{!Order.Owner:User.FirstName} {!Order.Owner:User.LastName}

Portal Information

End Customer:{!Order.End_Customer__c}
Application:{!Order.Application__c}
Potential Volume:{!Order.Potential_Volume1__c}

Order Items

{!Get_Product_Details.OrderItemTableRows}
Item NameQuantityUnit

Rejection Comments

{!Get_Approval_Submission_Detail.Comments}

View Order in Salesforce


Best regards,

Your CRM Support Team

(This is an automated message from the mySalesforce system.)
